```{r}
# Anna Karenina by Leo Tolstoy
text <- readLines("https://www.gutenberg.org/files/1399/1399-0.txt")[0:39819+54]
```

```{r}
punc <- gsub('[a-zA-Z0-9 ]', '', text)
punc <- punc[punc != ""]
punc <- data.frame(punc)
```

```{r}
# example?
p <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(wt, mpg, label = rownames(mtcars)))
p + geom_text(check_overlap = TRUE)
mtcars
```

```{r}
x <- rep(1:174, each=174)
y <- rep(1:174, 174)

blank <- data.frame(rep("", 285))
colnames(blank) <- "punc"
punc <- rbind(punc, blank)

matrix <- as.tibble(cbind(x,y,punc))

matrix %>% ggplot(aes(x,y, label = punc)) + geom_text(check_overlap = TRUE) +  
  theme(axis.title.x=element_blank(),
        axis.text.x=element_blank(),
        axis.ticks.x=element_blank(),
        axis.title.y=element_blank(),
        axis.text.y=element_blank(),
        axis.ticks.y=element_blank()) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(caption = "test")
```
